c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no) R,(select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPG),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG, 0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm and f.ar_no=g.ar_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) S where R.ar_no=S.ar_no order by R.ar_no
TCName.VartoFCST: select R.loc_nm,(R.PLN_SLS_MPG - S.FCST_SLS_MPG) as VAR_TO_FCST_SLS_MPG from (select e.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by e.loc_nm order by e.loc_nm) R, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) S where R.loc_nm=S.loc_nm order by R.loc_nm
TCName.VartoFCSTTotal: select R.ar_no,(R.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG - S.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.PLN_SALES_WPG,0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no, ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SALES_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no) R,(select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(d.FCST_SLS_MPG),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm and f.ar_no=g.ar_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) S where R.ar_no=S.ar_no order by R.ar_no

TCName.name: PercentageLYsales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PercentLYSales: select pln_sls.loc_nm, CASE when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG=0 and actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_MPG=0 Then 0 When pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG=0 Then -100 When actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_MPG=0 Then 100 ELSE ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG / actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_MPG)-1)*100,2) END as LY_PRCNT_SLS_MPG from (select e.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by e.loc_nm order by e.loc_nm) pln_sls, (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as LY_ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'LYFinYr' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) actl_sls where pln_sls.loc_nm=actl_sls.loc_nm order by pln_sls.loc_nm
TCName.PercentLYSalesTotal: select pln_sls.ar_no, CASE when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG=0 and actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG=0 Then 0 When pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG=0 Then -100 When actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG=0 Then 100 ELSE ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG / actl_sls.LY_ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG)-1)*100,2) END as LY_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.PLN_SALES_WPG,0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no, ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SALES_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no) pln_sls, (select J.ar_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as LY_ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'LYFinYr' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) actl_sls where pln_sls.ar_no=actl_sls.ar_no order by pln_sls.ar_no

TCName.name: BudgetPercentageSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetPercentage: select pln_sls.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG/bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as BDGT_PRCNT_SLS_MPG from (select e.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by e.loc_nm order by e.loc_nm) pln_sls, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_WPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.loc_nm=bdgt_sls.loc_nm order by pln_sls.loc_nm
TCName.BudgetPercentageTotal: select pln_sls.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG/bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as BDGT_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(PLN_SLS_WPG),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.PLN_SALES_WPG,0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no, ROUND(sum(a.sales),0) as PLN_SALES_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no) pln_sls, (select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_WPG),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_WPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm and f.ar_no=g.ar_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.ar_no=bdgt_sls.ar_no
TCName.ForecastPercentage: select pln_sls.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(frcst_sls.frcst_sls_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(frcst_sls.frcst_sls_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPG/frcst_sls.frcst_sls_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as fcst_PRCNT_SLS_MPG from (select g.loc_nm,g.PLN_SLS_MPG from (select f.loc_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(sales) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' ) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.loc_no,f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g) pln_sls, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.fcst_SALES_WPG,0) as frcst_sls_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(fcst_SALES),0) as fcst_SALES_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as fcst_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as fcst_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) frcst_sls where pln_sls.loc_nm=frcst_sls.loc_nm order by pln_sls.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastPercentageTotal: select pln_sls.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 and NVL(frcst_sls.frcst_sls_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(frcst_sls.frcst_sls_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG/frcst_sls.frcst_sls_TOT_WPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as fcst_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_WPG) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(sales) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' ) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.ar_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_sls, (select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(d.frcst_sls_WPG),0) as frcst_sls_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.fcst_SALES_WPG,0) as frcst_sls_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(fcst_SALES),0) as fcst_SALES_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as fcst_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as fcst_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm and f.ar_no=g.ar_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) frcst_sls where pln_sls.ar_no=frcst_sls.ar_no

TCName.name: BudgetWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWages: select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no, C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a. dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select d.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(BDGT_WGE_MPG),0),0) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWages: select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE_MPG),0) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b. ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm and f.ar_no=g.ar_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWages: select f.loc_nm,Nvl(sum(e.pln_wage_mnth_pln_str),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as pln_wage_mnth_pln_str from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c. zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm group by f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no ,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedLYWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedLYWages: select pln_wge_cy.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPG / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_CY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_wge_cy, (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.loc_nm=actl_wge_ly.loc_nm order by pln_wge_cy.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedLYWagesTotal: Select pln_wge_cy.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPG / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_wge_cy, (select V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no) V group by V.ar_no order by V.ar_no) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.ar_no=actl_wge_ly.ar_no order by pln_wge_cy.ar_no

TCName.name: BudgetWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentage: select x.loc_nm, case when NVL(x.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.BDGT_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.BDGT_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.BDGT_WAGE_MPG / y.BDGT_SLS_MPG)*100,2),0) end as BDGT_WGE_PRCNT_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) x,(select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) y where x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_nm
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentageTotal: select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPG / y.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG)*100,2),0) end as BDGT_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPG from (select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WGE_MPG),0) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b. loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b. zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) x, (select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES_MPG),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) y where x.ar_no=y.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentage: select x.loc_nm, case when NVL(x.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.FCST_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.FCST_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.FCST_WAGE_MPG / y.FCST_SLS_MPG)*100,2),0) end as FCST_WGE_PRCNT_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) x,(select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP. mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm) y where x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentageTotal: select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPG / y.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG)*100,2),0) end as FCST_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPG from (select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(FCST_WGE_MPG),0) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b. ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) x,(select d.ar_no,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES_MPG),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES), 0) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b. zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) d group by d.ar_no order by d.ar_no) y where x.ar_no=y.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentage: select x.loc_nm, case when NVL(x.PLN_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.PLN_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.PLN_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.PLN_WAGE_MPG / y.PLN_SLS_MPG)*100,2),0) end as PLN_WGE_PRCNT_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) x, (select g.loc_nm,g.PLN_SLS_MPG from (select f.loc_no,f.loc_nm,NVL (ROUND(sum(e.GEN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION*/ select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(sales) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) /*and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' )*/ group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.loc_no,f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g) y where x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageTotal: select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG / y.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPG)*100,2),0) end as PLN_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp. loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id= b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20,85)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) x, (select g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum (a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b. perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION*/ select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(sales) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) /*and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area')*/ group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.ar_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) y where x.ar_no=y.ar_no

TCName.name: LYWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYWagesPercentage: select actl_wge_ly.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPG)*100,2),0) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_MPG from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm) actl_wge_ly, (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'LYFinYr' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.loc_nm=actl_sls_ly.loc_nm order by actl_wge_ly.loc_nm
TCName.LYWagesPercentageTotal: select actl_wge_ly.ar_no, case when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPG)*100,2),0) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPG from (select V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no) V group by V.ar_no order by V.ar_no) actl_wge_ly, (select J.ar_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'LYFinYr' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.ar_no=actl_sls_ly.ar_no order by actl_wge_ly.ar_no

TCName.name: SMSHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.SMSHours: select x.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((y.SMS_HOURS_MPS*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)),2) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no, sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC, a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_nm
TCName.SMSHoursTotal: select g.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((SUM(g.SMS_HRS_MPG)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm, A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedHours: select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) ,0) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum (d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no, TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) ,0) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear') d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no

TCName.name: HoursLY_CurrentMonth
TCName.HoursLY: select pln_hrs_cy.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPG / actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPG)-1)*100,0),0) end as LY_PRCNT_HRS_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_CY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no in ('FinWeek') and b.fin_yr in ('FinYear') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs_cy, (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_LY_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no in ('FinWeek') and fin_yr in ('LYFinYr')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.loc_nm=actl_hrs_ly.loc_nm order by pln_hrs_cy.loc_nm
TCName.HoursLYTotal: select pln_hrs_cy.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPG / actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPG)-1)*100,0),0) end as LY_PRCNT_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no in ('FinWeek') and b.fin_yr in ('FinYear') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs_cy, (select V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no in ('FinWeek') and fin_yr in ('LYFinYr')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no) V group by V.ar_no order by V.ar_no) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.ar_no=actl_hrs_ly.ar_no order by pln_hrs_cy.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedOR_CurrentMonth
TCName.plannedOR: select sms_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG)*100,2),0) end as PLN_OR_MPG from (select x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_no) sms_hrs, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.loc_nm=pln_hrs.loc_nm order by sms_hrs.loc_nm
TCName.plannedORTotal: select sms_hrs.ar_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG)*100,2),0) end as PLN_OR_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedCPH: select pln_wge.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG),2),0) end as PLN_CPH_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_wge, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.loc_nm=pln_hrs.loc_nm order by pln_wge.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select pln_wge.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when
