NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG),2),0) end as PLN_CPH_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_wge, (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no

TCName.name: GrowthLYCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.GrowthLYCPH: select pln_cph_cy.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPG / actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as GROWTH_LY_CPH_MPG from (select pln_wge.loc_nm, CASE When pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPG=0 Then 0 When pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG),2) END as PLN_CPH_CY_MPG from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_wge, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where d.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear')*/ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.loc_nm=pln_hrs.loc_nm) pln_cph_cy, (select V.loc_nm, CASE When V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG=0 Then 0 When W.ACTL_HRS_MPG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG / W.ACTL_HRS_MPG),2) END as ACTL_CPH_LY_MPG from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm) V INNER JOIN (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm) W on V.loc_nm=W.loc_nm) actl_cph_ly where pln_cph_cy.loc_nm=actl_cph_ly.loc_nm order by pln_cph_cy.loc_nm
TCName.GrowthLYCPHTotal: select pln_cph_cy.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND(((pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_MPG / actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_MPG)-1)*100,2),0) end as GROWTH_LY_CPH_TOT_MPG from (select pln_wge.ar_no, CASE When pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG=0 Then 0 When pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG),2) END as PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_MPG from (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_wge, (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_wge.ar_no) pln_cph_cy, (select x.ar_no, CASE When x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPG=0 Then 0 When y.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPG / y.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPG),2) END as ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_MPG from (select V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no) V group by V.ar_no order by V.ar_no) x INNER JOIN (select V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no ='FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no) V group by V.ar_no order by V.ar_no) y on x.ar_no=y.ar_no order by x.ar_no) actl_cph_ly where pln_cph_cy.ar_no=actl_cph_ly.ar_no order by pln_cph_cy.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedItemPrice_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedItemPrice: select J.loc_nm, case when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((J.ACTL_SLS_MPG / N.ACTL_ITM_MPG),2),0) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_MPG from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.sales) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a, WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J INNER JOIN (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c. loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.items) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) N on J.loc_nm=N.loc_nm order by J.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedItemPriceTotal: select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG),2),0) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPG from (select J.ar_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.sales) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no, s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) x INNER JOIN (select J.ar_no,SUM (J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc, s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) y on x.ar_no=y.ar_no order by x.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedItems_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedItems: select e.loc_nm,NVL(d.pln_itm_wpg,0) as pln_itm_wpg from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.items),0) as PLN_itm_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm ORDER BY E.LOC_NM
TCName.PlannedItemsTotal: select f.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(PLN_itm_WPG),0),0) as PLN_itm_TOT_WPG from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.PLN_items_WPG,0) as PLN_itm_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.items),0) as PLN_items_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedIPLHitems_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedIPLHitems: select sms_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(sms_hrs.pln_itm_wpg,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.pln_itm_wpg,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.pln_itm_wpg / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG),0),0) end as PLN_IPLH_MPG from (select e.loc_nm,NVL(d.pln_itm_wpg,0) as pln_itm_wpg from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.items),0) as PLN_itm_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) sms_hrs, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.loc_nm=pln_hrs.loc_nm order by sms_hrs.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedIPLHitemsTotal: select sms_hrs.ar_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.PLN_itm_TOT_WPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.PLN_itm_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.PLN_itm_TOT_WPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPG),0),0) end as PLN_IPLH_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(PLN_itm_WPG),0),0) as PLN_itm_TOT_WPG from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.PLN_items_WPG,0) as PLN_itm_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.items),0) as PLN_items_WPG from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and c.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.ar_no order by f.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_WPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by sms_hrs.ar_no

TCName.name: PlannedPercentOnLY_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedpercentonLY: select pln_itm_prz_cy.loc_nm, case when NVL(pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_WPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_WPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_WPS,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_WPS,0)=0 then 100 else NVl(ROUND(((pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_WPS / actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_WPS)-1)*100,2),0) end as PLN_PRCNT_LY_ITM_PRZ_WPS from (select J.loc_nm, case when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((J.ACTL_SLS_MPG / N.ACTL_ITM_MPG),9),0) end as PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_WPS from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.sales) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a, WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J INNER JOIN (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c. loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.items) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.pln_fcst_cmb_vw a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.proc_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) N on J.loc_nm=N.loc_nm) pln_itm_prz_cy, (select J.loc_nm, case when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(j.ACTL_SLS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(n.ACTL_ITM_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((J.ACTL_SLS_MPG / N.ACTL_ITM_MPG),9),0) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_WPS from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a, WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J INNER JOIN (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c. loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) N on J.loc_nm=N.loc_nm) actl_itm_prz_ly where pln_itm_prz_cy.loc_nm=actl_itm_prz_ly.loc_nm order by pln_itm_prz_cy.loc_nm
TCName.PlannedpercentonLYTotal: select pln_itm_prz_cy.ar_no, case when NVL(pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_TOT_WPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_TOT_WPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_TOT_WPS,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_TOT_WPS,0)=0 then 100 else NVl(ROUND(((pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_TOT_WPS / actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_TOT_WPS)-1)*100,2),0) end as PLN_PRCNT_LY_ITM_PRZ_TOT_WPS from (select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG),9),0) end as PLN_ITM_PRZ_CY_TOT_WPS from (select J.ar_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.sales) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no, s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) x INNER JOIN (select J.ar_no,SUM (J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc, s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) y on x.ar_no=y.ar_no order by x.ar_no) pln_itm_prz_cy, (select x.ar_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG),9),0) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_LY_TOT_WPS from (select J.ar_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no, s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) x INNER JOIN (select J.ar_no,SUM (J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPG from (select T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEM,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEM from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_ITEM),0) as ACTL_ITEM from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') and b.FIN_YR in ('LYFinYr') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc, s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_no) J group by J.ar_no order by ar_no) y on x.ar_no=y.ar_no order by x.ar_no) actl_itm_prz_ly where pln_itm_prz_cy.ar_no=actl_itm_prz_ly.ar_no

TCName.name: BGDT_FCST_OR_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetOR: select src.loc_nm, case when (select datavalue from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR where updtime in (select max(updtime) from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR)) in ('Hide Budget Hour and OR%','Show Budget Hour Hide Budget OR%') then 0 else src.BDGT_OR_WPG end as BDGT_OR_WPS from (select f.loc_nm, case when NVL(g.BDGT_SMS_WPG,0)=0 and NVL(g.BDGT_HRS_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(g.BDGT_SMS_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(g.BDGT_HRS_WPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((g.BDGT_SMS_WPG / g.BDGT_HRS_WPG) * 100,2),0) end as BDGT_OR_WPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(c.bdgt_sms_hrs) as BDGT_SMS_WPG,sum(c.bdgt_hrs) as BDGT_HRS_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id, NVL(bdgt_sms_hrs,0) as bdgt_sms_hrs, NVL(bdgt_hrs,0) as bdgt_hrs from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) src order by src.loc_nm
TCName.BudgetORTotal: select src.ar_no, case when (select datavalue from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR where updtime in (select max(updtime) from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR)) in ('Hide Budget Hour and OR%','Show Budget Hour Hide Budget OR%') then 0 else src.BDGT_OR_TOT_WPG end as BDGT_OR_WPS from (select f.ar_no, case when NVL(g.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 and NVL(g.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(g.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(g.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPG,0)=0 then 100 else NVL(ROUND((g.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPG / g.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPG) * 100,2),0) end as BDGT_OR_TOT_WPG from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by ar_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,sum(c.BDGT_SMS_WPG) as BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPG,sum(c.BDGT_HRS_WPG) as BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPG from (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(c.bdgt_sms_hrs) as BDGT_SMS_WPG,sum(c.bdgt_hrs) as BDGT_HRS_WPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id, NVL(bdgt_sms_hrs,0) as bdgt_sms_hrs, NVL(bdgt_hrs,0) as bdgt_hrs from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and fin_yr = 'FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) C group by C.ar_no order by C.ar_no) g on f.ar_no=g.ar_no) src order by src.ar_no
TCName.ForecastOR: select sms_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPG)*100,0) end as FCST_OR_WPG from (select x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_no) sms_hrs, (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_MPG,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.plan_paid_hours)),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPG from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,nvl(plan_paid_hours,0) as plan_paid_hours from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.loc_nm=pln_hrs.loc_nm order by sms_hrs.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastORTotal: select sms_hrs.ar_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG)*100,0) end as FCST_OR_TOT_WPG from (select g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPG from (select f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_MPG,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and ar_no='Area' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND((sum(d.plan_paid_hours)),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPG from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,nvl(a.plan_paid_hours,0) plan_paid_hours from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and c.zone_no='Zone' and c.ar_no='Area' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no = 'FinWeek' and b.fin_yr = 'FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_no) g group by g.ar_no order by g.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by sms_hrs.ar_no

TCName.name: MonthlyViewMetricsValidation
TCName.Sales: select f.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct wk_id,fin_wk_no from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month' order by wk_id) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.SalesTotal: select 'Total' as Tot,NVL(ROUND(e.PLAN_SALES,0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on lc.perd_desc=e.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc
TCName.Wages: select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(ROUND(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE),9) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),9) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id
TCName.WagesTotal: select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no order by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c/* , loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no order by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no)) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc
TCName.WagePercentage: select pln_wge.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0) as PLN_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_wge, (select f.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct wk_id,fin_wk_no from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month' order by wk_id) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) pln_sls where pln_wge.fin_wk_no=pln_sls.fin_wk_no order by pln_wge.fin_wk_no
TCName.WagePercentageTotal: select 'Total' as Tot, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PCT_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no order by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no order by d.perd_desc,d.loc_no)) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc) pln_wge, (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(ROUND(e.PLAN_SALES,0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on lc.perd_desc=e.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc) pln_sls where pln_wge.perd_desc=pln_sls.perd_desc order by pln_wge.perd_desc
TCName.CPHValue: select pln_wge.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG),2) end as PLN_CPH_WTSG from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0) as PLN_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where TCName.PlanPaidHours: select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(ROUND(e.PLN_HOUR_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_HR_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HOUR_WTSG from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),9) as MGR_WKY_HRS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),9) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id

TCName.ORPercentage: select sms_hrs.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG,0)=0 then 100 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSG)*100,1) end as PLN_OR_WTSG from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_WTSG,0) as SMS_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.wk_id,sum(C.SMS_HOURS_WTSG) as SMS_HOURS_WTSG from (select a.wk_id,a.loc_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND((((sum(fix_hrs) + Sum(vol_hrs))*100)/25),9)*25)/100),9),0) as SMS_HOURS_WTSG from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no, a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d /*,loc_dept ld */ where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and ld.dept_no=d.dept_no*/ ) A group by a.wk_id,a.loc_no order by a.wk_id,a.loc_no) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) y on lc.wk_id=y.wk_id order by lc.wk_id)sms_hrs, (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_HOURS_WTSG) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),9) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.loc_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),9) as BASE_HOURS_WTSG from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.loc_no order by d.wk_id,d.loc_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.fin_wk_no=pln_hrs.fin_wk_no order by sms_hrs.fin_wk_no
